msg.msgText:
A "SecurityProfile" composite object can be created using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver create SecurityProfile help imaserver create SecurityProfile "Name=value" "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create SecurityProfile "Name=SecProfile" "CertificateProfile=CertProfile"
Configuration items for "SecurityProfile" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
